summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating global shadcn/Tailwind CSS variables in frontend/src/index.css to an orange/yellow primary, blue secondary, green accent, and light background with readable foregrounds. REQ-2 appears largely implemented via a new PrimaryCtaButton wrapper applying a gradient-primary-cta utility class, and that wrapper is adopted in multiple primary-CTA locations (cart/checkout/product/admin/vendor/customer/profile setup). Some additional theme tokens/utilities were added beyond the request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified dark theme palette values (beyond the request which focused on active light theme).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only required updating the active (light) theme variables; dark theme changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced extra global design tokens (chart palette and success variables).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only asked for primary/secondary/accent/background and readable foreground counterparts; chart and success tokens were not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new shadow utility classes (shadow-soft, shadow-soft-lg).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; appears as additional styling utilities.
